common
Class MessageQueue

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--common.MessageQueue
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MessageQueue
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

It defines 2 methods, enqueu, to put SocketData items into the internal Vector, and run, which is requred be Runnable (this is a threaded class) and grabs any items off the Vector. It uses a combination of wait() and notify() to keep the run method from polling on an empty queue.

Version:
0.8
Author:
Joseph Monti countjoe@users.sourceforge.net, Code Connector
